Training

JE Bennett Law Solicitors are committed to providing education in our areas of expertise. An experienced speaker, Jane regularly presents locally, in the Sevenoaks vicinity, on the subjects of her personal expertise. She has also led seminars throughout the UK on Personal Injury Trusts to train other lawyers through MBL seminars.

Jane's seminar Managing Personal Injury Trusts - For PI & Private Client Lawyers is available as a webinar.

Read more about the event Book Webinar now

"Very clear and knowledgeable"

"Excellent - extremely informative"

"Excellent knowledge & pace, really good delivery of content"

- Comments from previous delegates

Other training and presentations

Jane gave an APAD presentation at Brewin Dolphin in London to local authority deputies of the London boroughs, on 18.6.2015, in association with Chase de Vere.

Jane is actively involved in knowledge-sharing with key groups in her field. She regularly presents on elderly client law to local care homes. She has also spoken at presentations for the Good Care Group (via Symponia), and Sunrise residential home in Sevenoaks.

Jane presented to a national catastrophic injury panel of leading defendant litigators in May 2014 on the direct recommendation of national insurer, Ageas.
